context: Hi l like tear jerker movies. I like Happy Christmas (2014) . Have you seen it?

have you seen it? No I have not seen Elf.
resp: Ahhhh I highly recommend watching Elf-Man (2012) sooooo funny sooo good for family too Well great talking to you have a great day bye :)
